en: I had no choice but to accept the job offer due to financial pressure.
cn: 由于经济压力，我别无选择只能接受这份工作。

en: She had no choice but to apologize after realizing her mistake.
cn: 意识到错误后，她别无选择只能道歉。

en: Solar wind consists of charged particles emitted from the sun.
cn: 太阳风由太阳发射的带电粒子组成。

en: The auroras are caused by solar wind interacting with Earth's magnetic field.
cn: 极光是由太阳风与地球磁场相互作用引起的。

en: The new café is doing a land-office business since it opened last month.
cn: 这家新咖啡馆自上个月开业以来生意兴隆。

en: During the holiday season, retailers often do a land-office business.
cn: 在假日季节，零售商通常生意兴隆。

en: Excessive shopping can lead to financial problems and clutter.
cn: 过度购物可能导致财务问题和杂物堆积。

en: She realized her excessive shopping was a way to cope with stress.
cn: 她意识到自己的过度购物是一种应对压力的方式。

en: She is an all-round athlete, excelling in multiple sports.
cn: 她是一名全面的运动员，在多项运动中表现出色。

en: This tool is an all-round solution for home repairs.
cn: 这个工具是家庭维修的全面解决方案。

en: Children often exhibit copy behavior by imitating their parents.
cn: 儿童经常通过模仿父母表现出模仿行为。

en: Copy behavior in social settings can help people fit in.
cn: 社交场合中的模仿行为能帮助人们融入。

en: Let's go for dinner at that new Italian restaurant tonight.
cn: 我们今晚去那家新开的意大利餐厅吃晚餐吧。

en: They often go for dinner together after work.
cn: 他们下班后经常一起去吃晚餐。

en: After all his lies, he had it coming when everyone found out.
cn: 他撒了那么多谎，真相大白时是咎由自取。

en: She worked so hard that she has a promotion coming.
cn: 她工作非常努力，升职是应得的。

en: Please give it to the manager when you see him.
cn: 见到经理时请把这个交给他。

en: She decided to give it to her sister as a birthday gift.
cn: 她决定把它作为生日礼物送给妹妹。

en: Please keep off the grass to protect the new seedlings.
cn: 请勿践踏草坪，以保护新种的幼苗。

en: He tries to keep off sugary drinks for health reasons.
cn: 出于健康原因，他尽量不喝含糖饮料。

en: She has on a beautiful dress for the party tonight.
cn: 她今晚穿着一条漂亮的裙子去参加派对。

en: What do you have on for the meeting tomorrow?
cn: 你明天开会穿什么？

en: With proper training, he stands a chance of winning the competition.
cn: 经过适当训练，他有机会赢得比赛。

en: Do you think we stand a chance of finishing the project on time?
cn: 你认为我们有机会按时完成项目吗？

en: He always has his way with the budget, ignoring others' suggestions.
cn: 他总是按自己的意愿处理预算，无视他人的建议。

en: In the story, the villain had his way with the helpless villagers.
cn: 故事中，恶棍任意摆布无助的村民。

en: She has him on a string, making him do whatever she wants.
cn: 她操纵着他，让他做任何她想做的事。

en: The boss has the entire team on a string with strict deadlines.
cn: 老板用严格的截止日期控制着整个团队。

en: It took me a while to get used to waking up early for work.
cn: 我花了一段时间才习惯早起上班。

en: She quickly got used to driving on the left side of the road in the UK.
cn: 她很快习惯了在英国靠左行驶。

en: Before the exam, she decided to brush up on her math lessons.
cn: 考试前，她决定复习数学功课。

en: He brushed up on his French lessons before traveling to Paris.
cn: 在去巴黎旅行前，他重新学习了法语课程。

en: He spent the afternoon putting together a new bookshelf.
cn: 他花了一下午时间组装一个新书架。

en: Can you help me put this puzzle together?
cn: 你能帮我拼这个拼图吗？

en: Early education plays a crucial role in child development.
cn: 早期教育在儿童发展中起着至关重要的作用。

en: Researchers study child development to understand how kids learn and grow.
cn: 研究人员研究儿童发展以了解孩子如何学习和成长。

en: Can you bring me up to date on the project's progress?
cn: 你能向我更新一下项目的进展吗？

en: The manager brought the team up to date on the new company policies.
cn: 经理向团队通报了公司新政策的最新情况。

en: In the matter of the contract dispute, both parties agreed to mediation.
cn: 关于合同纠纷，双方同意进行调解。

en: The committee will make a decision in the matter of funding allocations.
cn: 委员会将就资金分配事宜做出决定。

en: Many students took part in the school's annual science fair.
cn: 许多学生参加了学校的年度科学展览。

en: She decided to take part in the charity run to support a good cause.
cn: 她决定参加慈善跑步活动，支持一项公益事业。

en: This farm grows pesticide-free vegetables to ensure consumer safety.
cn: 这个农场种植无农药蔬菜，以确保消费者安全。

en: More people are choosing pesticide-free products for environmental reasons.
cn: 出于环保原因，越来越多人选择无农药产品。

en: She was furious with her brother about breaking her favorite vase.
cn: 她对弟弟打碎她最喜欢的花瓶感到非常愤怒。

en: He was furious at the company for its unfair policies.
cn: 他对公司的不公平政策感到非常愤怒。

en: She had a hand in organizing the community event.
cn: 她参与了社区活动的组织工作。

en: The expert had a hand in developing the new software.
cn: 这位专家参与了新软件的开发。

en: Behavioral communication includes gestures, facial expressions, and posture.
cn: 行为沟通包括手势、面部表情和姿势。

en: The course covers theories of behavioral communication in social interactions.
cn: 这门课程涵盖了社会互动中的行为沟通理论。

en: It doesn't seem to rain today, so we can go for a walk.
cn: 今天似乎不会下雨，所以我们可以去散步。

en: The plan doesn't seem to work as expected, so we need to adjust it.
cn: 这个计划似乎没有按预期进行，所以我们需要调整。

en: The sudden budget cuts put the skids under our expansion plans.
cn: 突然的预算削减阻碍了我们的扩张计划。

en: His negative comments put the skids under the team's morale.
cn: 他的负面评论破坏了团队的士气。

en: What are you doing that for? It seems unnecessary.
cn: 你为什么要那样做？似乎没必要。

en: He asked what I needed the money for, and I explained it was for rent.
cn: 他问我需要钱做什么，我解释说是为了付房租。

en: The company gave him the sack after he was consistently late.
cn: 公司在他持续迟到后解雇了他。

en: She was given the sack for violating company policies.
cn: 她因违反公司政策而被解雇。

en: I need to hunt up some old photos for the family album.
cn: 我需要为家庭相册搜寻一些旧照片。

en: He hunted up the documents required for the application.
cn: 他查找了申请所需的文件。

en: She always has a piece of chocolate for herself after dinner.
cn: 她总是在晚餐后为自己留一块巧克力。

en: He saved some money to have something for himself in case of emergencies.
cn: 他存了一些钱为自己应急之用。

en: He proposed doing a feasibility study before starting the project.
cn: 他建议在开始项目前进行可行性研究。

en: The committee proposed doing a review of the current policies.
cn: 委员会建议对当前政策进行审查。

en: She is fluent in her first language, Mandarin, and speaks it without any accent.
cn: 她精通她的母语普通话，说话不带任何口音。

en: Being fluent in one's first language is essential for effective communication in daily life.
cn: 精通母语对于日常生活中的有效沟通至关重要。

en: The suspect's description is identical to the witness's account.
cn: 嫌疑人的描述与证人的叙述完全相同。

en: Her handwriting is identical to her sister's, making it hard to tell them apart.
cn: 她的笔迹和她姐姐的完全相同，很难区分。

en: He always tries to do right by his employees by offering fair wages.
cn: 他总是通过提供公平的工资来公平对待员工。

en: She did right by her friend by supporting her during tough times.
cn: 她在困难时期支持朋友，做了对她有利的事。

en: I can relate to her struggles because I've been through similar experiences.
cn: 我能理解她的挣扎，因为我经历过类似的事情。

en: Many readers relate to the characters in the novel due to their realistic portrayals.
cn: 许多读者因小说中角色的真实描绘而产生共鸣。

en: I'm fed up with all the delays in this project.
cn: 我对这个项目的所有延误感到厌烦。

en: She was fed up with his constant complaining.
cn: 她受够了他不断的抱怨。

en: She still holds a grudge against him for forgetting her birthday.
cn: 她仍然因为他忘记她的生日而怀恨在心。

en: It's unhealthy to hold a grudge for so many years.
cn: 记仇这么多年是不健康的。

en: She put over her ideas clearly during the presentation.
cn: 她在演示中清晰地传达了自己的想法。

en: He struggled to put over the complex concept to the audience.
cn: 他努力向观众解释这个复杂的概念。

en: They decided to string out the meeting to discuss all points thoroughly.
cn: 他们决定延长会议以彻底讨论所有要点。

en: The negotiations were strung out over several months.
cn: 谈判被拖延了好几个月。

en: She looked at him crossly when he interrupted her speech.
cn: 当他打断她的演讲时，她生气地看着他。

en: The teacher looked at the student crossly for not paying attention.
cn: 老师因学生不专心而不悦地看着他。

en: The thief ran off with the stolen goods.
cn: 小偷带着偷来的物品逃跑了。

en: The dog ran off into the woods.
cn: 狗跑进了树林里。

en: You should make allowances for his inexperience.
cn: 你应该体谅他的缺乏经验。

en: We need to make allowances for the bad weather in our plans.
cn: 我们需要在计划中考虑到恶劣天气。

en: He struck into a conversation without being invited.
cn: 他突然开始参与对话，未经邀请。

en: The band struck into a lively tune.
cn: 乐队突然开始演奏一首欢快的曲子。

en: Please put out the candle before leaving.
cn: 离开前请熄灭蜡烛。

en: The firefighters put out the blaze quickly.
cn: 消防员迅速扑灭了大火。

en: You should avoid eating too much sugar.
cn: 你应该避免吃太多糖。

en: He avoids driving in heavy traffic.
cn: 他避免在交通拥堵时开车。

en: I cannot but agree with your point.
cn: 我不得不同意你的观点。

en: She cannot but feel sorry for the situation.
cn: 她只能为这种情况感到遗憾。

en: Use a heavy line to outline the main shapes in the drawing.
cn: 用粗线勾勒出绘图中的主要形状。

en: The artist preferred a heavy line for bold effects.
cn: 艺术家喜欢用粗线来达到大胆的效果。

en: I cannot help laughing at that joke.
cn: 我忍不住笑那个笑话。

en: She cannot help worrying about her children.
cn: 她不得不担心她的孩子们。

en: I need to make time for exercise in my busy schedule.
cn: 我需要在繁忙的日程中为锻炼腾出时间。

en: She always makes time for her family despite her demanding job.
cn: 尽管工作繁重，她总是为家人腾出时间。

en: The students debated with their teacher on the topic of climate change.
cn: 学生们与老师就气候变化话题进行了辩论。

en: He debated with his colleague on the best approach to the project.
cn: 他与同事就项目的最佳方法进行了辩论。

en: He earned big bucks from his investment.
cn: 他从投资中赚了大笔钱。

en: That car costs megabucks, so I can't afford it.
cn: 那辆车要巨款，所以我买不起。

en: In an emergency, it's important to keep your wits about you.
cn: 在紧急情况下，保持头脑清醒很重要。

en: He kept his wits about him during the negotiation.
cn: 他在谈判期间保持了警惕。

en: Have fun at the party tonight!
cn: 今晚派对上玩得开心！

en: We had fun playing games all afternoon.
cn: 我们整个下午玩游戏玩得很开心。

en: I made his acquaintance at a conference last year.
cn: 我去年在一次会议上结识了他。

en: She was delighted to make the acquaintance of the famous author.
cn: 她很高兴能结识这位著名作家。

en: The doctor prescribed antibiotics for the bacterial infection.
cn: 医生为细菌感染开了抗生素。

en: A bacterial infection can cause fever and inflammation.
cn: 细菌感染可能导致发烧和炎症。

en: She made a delicious cake for the party.
cn: 她为聚会做了一个美味的蛋糕。

en: He makes furniture as a hobby.
cn: 他把制作家具当作爱好。

en: Even after retirement, he keeps his hand in gardening.
cn: 即使退休后，他仍保持参与园艺活动。

en: She keeps her hand in teaching by volunteering at a local school.
cn: 她通过在本地学校做志愿者来保持教学练习。

en: She won first prize in a contest last month.
cn: 她上个月在比赛中赢得了一等奖。

en: He participated in a contest to test his skills.
cn: 他参加了一场比赛来测试自己的技能。

en: I'm getting tired of doing the same routine every day.
cn: 我开始厌倦每天做同样的例行公事。

en: She got tired of doing all the housework by herself.
cn: 她厌倦了独自做所有家务。

en: After analyzing the data, we can draw a conclusion about the market trends.
cn: 分析数据后，我们可以得出关于市场趋势的结论。

en: It's too early to draw a conclusion without more evidence.
cn: 没有更多证据就得出结论为时过早。

en: I need to have it out with my roommate about the messy kitchen.
cn: 我需要和室友就厨房脏乱问题摊牌。

en: They had it out with each other and finally resolved their conflict.
cn: 他们彼此摊牌，最终解决了冲突。

en: Many students find it difficult to do advanced math problems.
cn: 许多学生发现做高等数学题很困难。

en: He finds it difficult to do public speaking without notes.
cn: 他发现没有笔记做公开演讲很困难。

en: She takes a positive view towards new challenges.
cn: 她对新挑战持积极观点。

en: The company takes a cautious view towards expanding overseas.
cn: 公司对海外扩张持谨慎观点。

en: Our new technology gives us an advantage over competitors.
cn: 我们的新技术让我们获得了对竞争对手的优势。

en: He got an advantage over his opponent by studying their strategies.
cn: 通过研究对手的策略，他获得了优势。

en: Let's stop chatting and get down to business.
cn: 我们别闲聊了，开始认真处理正事吧。

en: After the introductions, we got down to business quickly.
cn: 介绍完后，我们迅速开始处理正事。

en: Can you recommend a good book to me?
cn: 你能向我推荐一本好书吗？

en: I recommended this restaurant to my friends.
cn: 我向朋友们推荐了这家餐厅。

en: He made points with his boss by working overtime.
cn: 他通过加班赢得了老板的好感。

en: You can make points with her by remembering her birthday.
cn: 记住她的生日可以赢得她的认可。

en: You need to pay a deposit to reserve the apartment.
cn: 你需要支付定金来预订公寓。

en: We paid a deposit of $500 for the car.
cn: 我们为这辆车支付了500美元的定金。

en: They disputed with their neighbors about the property line.
cn: 他们与邻居就财产界线争论。

en: The two companies disputed over the patent rights.
cn: 两家公司就专利权争论。

en: Don't put obstacles in the way of progress.
cn: 不要在进步的道路上设置障碍。

en: He put a chair in the way to block the door.
cn: 他放了一把椅子来挡住门。

en: The witness put the finger on the suspect in the lineup.
cn: 证人在列队中指认了嫌疑人。

en: Don't put the finger on me for your mistakes.
cn: 不要因为你的错误来指责我。

en: The chemical reacts upon contact with water.
cn: 这种化学品一接触水就会反应。

en: Upon contact, the two surfaces bonded immediately.
cn: 一接触，两个表面立即粘合。

en: It took her months to get over the breakup.
cn: 她花了几个月才从分手恢复过来。

en: He quickly got over his cold and returned to work.
cn: 他很快从感冒中恢复并回去工作了。

en: It's a pleasure for me to help you with your project.
cn: 帮助你的项目对我来说是件乐事。

en: It was a pleasure for her to meet such interesting people.
cn: 见到这么有趣的人对她来说是件乐事。

en: Don't waste time watching TV when you have homework.
cn: 有作业时不要浪费时间看电视。

en: He wasted time arguing instead of finding a solution.
cn: 他浪费时间争论而不是找解决方案。

en: The patient had a spasm in his leg after the injury.
cn: 受伤后病人腿部痉挛。

en: She had a fit due to epilepsy and needed immediate care.
cn: 她因癫痫发作需要立即护理。

en: She wasted money buying clothes she never wears.
cn: 她浪费钱买了从不穿的衣服。

en: Don't waste money gambling; it's risky.
cn: 不要浪费钱赌博；这很冒险。

en: She knows the manual backwards and forwards after years of use.
cn: 使用多年后，她对手册了如指掌。

en: He knows the city backwards and forwards from his job as a tour guide.
cn: 作为导游，他对这座城市了如指掌。

en: I got help from my colleague to solve the problem.
cn: 我从同事那里获得帮助来解决问题。

en: She gets help from a tutor for her math homework.
cn: 她从家教那里获得数学作业的帮助。

en: We put the new software to use immediately after training.
cn: 培训后我们立即投入使用新软件。

en: She put her language skills to use by volunteering as a translator.
cn: 她通过志愿翻译来使用语言技能。

en: I consider him to be a reliable friend.
cn: 我认为他是一个可靠的朋友。

en: She is considered to be an expert in her field.
cn: 她被认为是她领域的专家。

en: Even if I fail, I'll give it my best shot in the competition.
cn: 即使失败，我也会在比赛中尽力一试。

en: He gave it his best shot to finish the project on time.
cn: 他尽力一试以按时完成项目。

en: Prices range from $10 to $100 depending on the model.
cn: 价格从10美元到100美元不等，取决于型号。

en: The ages of participants range from 18 to 65 years old.
cn: 参与者的年龄范围从18岁到65岁。

en: She made something of her talent by practicing daily.
cn: 她通过每天练习利用天赋取得了成功。

en: He made something of the old car by restoring it.
cn: 他通过修复旧车使其焕然一新。

en: Give the proposal a thought before you decide.
cn: 决定前考虑一下这个提议。

en: He didn't give the warning a thought and got into trouble.
cn: 他没有考虑警告并陷入麻烦。

en: Let me have the facts straight before I report.
cn: 让我在报告前弄清楚事实。

en: Do you have the instructions straight for the assembly?
cn: 你弄清楚组装说明了吗？

en: I always make time for my family despite a busy schedule.
cn: 尽管日程繁忙，我总是为家人腾出时间。

en: She makes time for her friends by planning ahead.
cn: 她通过提前计划为朋友腾出时间。

en: I left my keys at the lost and found in the airport.
cn: 我把钥匙留在机场的失物招领处了。

en: Check the lost and found if you misplace your wallet.
cn: 如果钱包放错地方，检查失物招领处。

en: We consider this decision to be crucial for our success.
cn: 我们认为这个决定对我们的成功至关重要。

en: The book is considered to be a classic in literature.
cn: 这本书被认为是文学经典。

en: I prefer reading books to watching movies.
cn: 我更喜欢读书而不是看电影。

en: She prefers walking to driving for short distances.
cn: 短距离她更喜欢步行而不是开车。

en: He has suffered from heart disease for many years.
cn: 他患心脏病已经很多年了。

en: Many people suffer from heart disease due to poor lifestyle choices.
cn: 许多人因不良生活方式而患有心脏病。

en: I need to do over this painting because I made a mistake.
cn: 我需要重画这幅画，因为我犯了个错误。

en: She decided to do over her essay to improve the grade.
cn: 她决定重写论文以提高分数。

en: The airline offers a saver fare for early bookings.
cn: 该航空公司为提前预订提供优惠票价。

en: I managed to get a saver fare for my trip to London.
cn: 我设法买到了去伦敦旅行的特价票。

en: It's hard to keep up with the latest technology trends.
cn: 很难跟上最新的技术趋势。

en: She runs fast to keep up with her friends.
cn: 她跑得很快以跟上她的朋友们。

en: I can't put my finger on what's wrong with this plan.
cn: 我无法准确指出这个计划有什么问题。

en: She put her finger on the exact reason for the failure.
cn: 她准确指出了失败的确切原因。

en: We should hold off on making a decision until we have more information.
cn: 我们应该推迟做决定，直到获得更多信息。

en: He decided to hold off on buying a car until next year.
cn: 他决定推迟到明年再买车。

en: I'll have a whack at fixing the computer myself.
cn: 我会尝试自己修理电脑。

en: Why don't you have a whack at solving this puzzle?
cn: 你为什么不尝试解决这个谜题？

en: I need to pump up the bicycle tires before we ride.
cn: 在我们骑车前，我需要给自行车轮胎打气。

en: Can you help me pump up the inflatable mattress?
cn: 你能帮我给充气床垫充气吗？

en: The project has started, and we are making good progress.
cn: 项目已经开始，我们进展顺利。

en: I have started learning Spanish this year.
cn: 我今年已经开始学习西班牙语。
